== public class Pokemon ==
This class will store:
name
level
attack
defense
special
speed
image
moves

It will have a method that will determine an type's effectiveness against another type.
Methods that return most of the data. A method that determines a move's strength based on stats. Also a method to level up.

== public class Move ==

power
image

Methods that access these data values.
